AUTHOR: Stevy
INSTALL_MSG: Have fun annoying people with mentions! Required: pip3 install numpy, scipy, and pillow. To enable level up messages for the server, you must do '[p]lvladmin lvlalert' or '[p]lvladmin lvlalert' enable all to enable for all servers.
NAME: leveler
DESCRIPTION: Increase activity(or not) on your server with chat exp!
